item.description:
Riverside Park Green Clean Party

Arrive at 10:00 AM. Boats depart by 10:30 AM. PFDs required.
In the event of rain, a cancel email will be sent by 8:00 AM Saturday.

Suitable for all kinds of boats. We will be above the bulk of the boat traffic.

Join us at Riverside Park for a Cleanup Party and Picnic. Paddlers join those on land to help clean Riverside Park for a couple of hours before lunch.

Then the Party starts. We will have all kinds of food and drinks. Plus live music. The party continues until late afternoon when it moves to Bank street and Hygienic Park for more live music.

We basically put in at the State Pier under I95. We paddle to Riverside Park and pick up trash in the water. Trash bags will be supplied at the put in.

This paddle is supported by the National River Cleanup in Washington DC.

DIRECTIONS: to 2 State Pier Rd, New London
Take Route 95 South to Exit 84S and stay left towards Downtown New London.
Take exit 84 S on the left toward Downtown New London
Merge onto Eugene O'Neill Dr and Turn left at Crystal Ave (traffic light).
Quickly turn right at State Pier Rd and drive to end.
item.name: Riverside Park Green Clean Party
